item.title: Read my README
item.author: me@iky.li (Ivan Li)
item.description: This README is a documentation of me. Reading this, you can get a good gist of what I do and what I’m here to achieve in the F&P CPAP software team. Important: NOT a replacement for actually getting to know each other more. My Job I’m the outcome owner for DevOps sub-team in the CPAP software team. This means I’m ultimately accountable for the development and release processes adopted for the 3 sub-teams.
